sourceMeaningMnemonic: There is a <radical>tsunami</radical> coming, so you stand on your <radical>roof</radical> holding a <radical>leaf</radical>, wearing <radical>fins</radical> before a <radical>rice paddy</radical> full of people. These are your neighbors and they're here to watch your <kanji>acting</kanji>.
meaningInfo: This <kanji>acting</kanji> will distract all of you from the impending tsunami. You wave the leaf and dance with the fins. It's a wonderful performance.
readingMnemonic: As the <kanji>acting</kanji> <reading>en</reading>ds (<ja>えん</ja>), so do you all.
readingInfo: The performance and the tsunami end together. How poetic.
